main_definition: Single refers to a person who is not married, or it can also mean one unit of something that has only one part.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not involved in a romantic relationship and unmarried
meanings_and_examples.example: She prefers to stay single for now.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having only one part, piece or unit
meanings_and_examples.example: He has a collection of single beer bottles.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A song with just one verse and no repeated chorus
meanings_and_examples.example: The artist released a new single that quickly gained popularity.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having only one person in a group or team, usually referring to sports teams
meanings_and_examples.example: During the championship match, they were playing with just a single player due to injuries.
